segments.text: Good Morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to change Australian dollars for RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do you want to change ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure . What's the rate today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 1 Australian dollar to 6.1 Yuan RIB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The rate was 1 Australia dollar to 6.5 Yuan yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It does , sir . Do you still want to have it changed now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me think ... Will the rate still go down tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know , sir . But it won't change much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to change 1000 Australian dollars for RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Please sign here in this form .
segments.speaker: S1
